Sudoku cross–hatching, is where you look at a single box with respect to two other boxes. You search for a specific number and see if that number will fit anywhere within the section you are looking at.
Let’s focus on number <c1>7</c1> and the <c1>highlighted area</c1>. A single number can not appear twice in the same row, column or box.
Therefore, <c1>7 </c1>can not be filled in the area marked with ”x” in <c1>this box</c1>, then there is only one cell left in <c1>this box </c1>that can be filled with <c1>7</c1>.

If two numbers only appear in two cells of a row, column, or block, we define this pair of numbers as a hidden pair. These two cells can only be filled with these two numbers so the other candidate numbers in these two cells can be eliminated.
Let’s focus on the marked numbers in this box.
In this box, <c1>5</c1> and <c1>9</c1> only appear in <c2>these two cells</c2>, so <c2>these two cells </c2>can only contain <c1>5</c1> and <c1>9</c1>.
Therefore, any number other than<c1> 5 </c1>and <c1>9 </c1>should be deleted from <c2>these two cells</c2>.

If four numbers only appear in four cells of a row, column, or block, and each cell contains two, three, or four of these four numbers, we define this set of numbers as a hidden quadruple, These four cells can only be filled with these four numbers, so the other candidate numbers in these four cellscan be eliminated.

In this row, <c1>2</c1>, <c1>6</c1>, <c1>7</c1> and <c1>8</c1> only appear in <c2>these four cells</c2>, so <c2>these four cells</c2> can only contain <c1>2</c1>, <c1>6</c1>, <c1>7</c1> and <c1>8</c1>.
Therefore, any number other than <c1>2</c1>, <c1>6</c1>, <c1>7</c1> and <c1>8</c1> should be deleted from <c2>these four cells</c2>.
If a cell has more than one candidate, but only that cell contains a certain number in its row, column, or block, then that cell can be directly filled with that number.
This is the only cell containing <c1>6</c1> in this row.

If three numbers only appear in three cells of a row, column, or block, and each cell contains two or three of these three numbers, we define this set of numbers as a hidden triple, These three cells can only be filled with these three numbers, so the other candidate numbers in these three cells can be eliminated.
Let’s focus on the marked numbers in this column.
In this column, <c1>1</c1>, <c1>5</c1> and <c1>9</c1> only appear in <c2>these three cells</c2>, so <c2>these three cells</c2> can only contain <c1>1</c1>, <c1>5</c1> and <c1>9</c1>.
Therefore, any number other than <c1>1</c1>, <c1>5</c1> and <c1>9</c1> should be deleted from <c2>these three cells</c2>.

If a candidate number can only appear in two or three cells of each of four rows or four columns, and these cells are exactly in the same four columns or four rows, then the candidate number can be eliminated from other cells in these four columns or four rows.

First, in these four rows, only <c2>these marked cells</c2> can be filled with <c1>9</c1>. Each row must have a cell filled with <c1>9</c1>, so four of <c2>these cells</c2> must be filled with <c1>9</c1>.
These cells are also restricted in <c1>four columns</c1>, so four of <c2>these cells</c2> in <c1>these four columns</c1> must be filled with <c1>9</c1>. And a number can only appear once in a column.
So <c2>a marked cell</c2> must be filled with <c1>9</c1> ineach of <c1>these four columns</c1>. Then we can delete <c1>9</c1> from other cells in <c1>these four columns</c1>.

If there are two cells in a row, column, or block that only contain the same two candidate numbers, we define this pair of numbers as a naked pair. These two numbers will not appear in the candidate numbers of other cells in the same row, column, or block. Therefore, we can eliminate these two numbers from the candidate numbers of other cells in that row, column, or block.
Let’s focus on the marked numbers in this column.
There are <c2>two cells</c2> in this column that share the exact same two candidates (<c1>1 </c1>and <c1>2</c1>), so <c1>1 </c1>and<c1> 2</c1> can only be placed in <c2>these two cells</c2>.
Therefore, we can delete <c1>1 </c1>and <c1>2 </c1>from other cells in the same column.

If four cells in a row, column, or block only contain two, three, or four candidate numbers that are the same, we define this set of numbers as a naked quadruple. These four numbers will not appear in the candidate numbers of other cells in the same row, column, or block.
Let’s focus on the marked numbers in this row.

There are <c2>four cells</c2> in this row that share the exact same four candidates(<c1>2</c1>, <c1>3</c1>, <c1>6</c1> and <c1>7</c1>), so <c1>2</c1>, <c1>3</c1>, <c1>6</c1> and <c1>7</c1> can only be placed in <c2>these four cells</c2>.
Therefore, we can delete <c1>2</c1>, <c1>3</c1>, <c1>6</c1> and <c1>7</c1> from other cells in the same row.
If a cell only has one candidate remaining then that cell can only be filled with that candidate number.

If three cells in a row, column, or block only contain two or three candidate numbers that are the same, we define this set of numbers as a naked triple. These three numbers will not appear in the candidate numbers of other cells in the same row, column, or block.
Let’s focus on the marked numbers in this row.
There are<c2> three cells</c2> in this row that share the exact same three candidates(<c1>1</c1>, <c1>2</c1> and <c1>7</c1>), so 1, 2 and only be placed in <c2>these three cells</c2>.
Therefore, we can delete <c1>1</c1>, <c1>2</c1> and <c1>7</c1> from other cells in the same row.

Muuwaji sudoku na barafu sudoku zote ni sudoku maalum, ambayo ni michezo isiyo na muda ambayo unaweza kuipata kwenye Ukurasa wa Nyumbani. Tofauti pekee kati ya Muuwaji sudoku na sudoku ya kawaida ni kuwepo kwa ngome, ambayo inaonyeshwa katika mistari yenye nukta. Kwa kila ngome, kuna nambari kwenye kona, ambayo inapaswa kuwa jumla kwa kila seli ambayo ngome hii ina. Na dhamira yako ni kujaza nambari ambayo inafuata sheria ya sudoku ya zamani na sheria ya jumla ya ngome. Kwa barafu sudoku, kazi yako ni kupasua cubes zote za barafu kwa hatua chache! Ili kupasua mchemraba mmoja wa barafu, unahitaji kutatua fumbo ambapo barafu iko. Unaweza kujaza kwa usahihi nambari za seli zote isipokuwa seli ya barafu katika safu moja, safu wima moja, au kisanduku kimoja ili kuvunja mchemraba wa barafu kwa mafanikio.
Je! ni michezo gani ya muuwashi sudoku na barafu sudoku? Jinsi ya kucheza sudoku na barafu sudoku?

Hali ya giza inapatikana kwenye mipangilio yetu, ambayo inaweza kukusaidia kabisa ikiwa ungependa kucheza michezo ya sudoku usiku. Kwanza, unaweza kufungua mchezo wa ugumu wowote, na unaweza kupata ikoni ya palette kwenye kona ya juu kulia ya skrini ya mchezo wako. Unapobofya, kutakuwa na mada tatu tofauti, na ya tatu ni hali ya giza.
Ninataka kucheza sudoku usiku, kwa hivyo ninawezaje kuwasha hali ya giza?
Ili kubadilisha kiwango cha ugumu, unaweza kutaja hatua zifuatazo
Gonga kitufe cha Mchezo Mpya kwenye skrini ya Mwanzo
Chagua kiwango chako bora cha ugumu

Gonga kitufe cha Penseli kwenye kona ya chini kulia ya skrini

Kisha, maelezo yako yatawasilishwa kwenye seli kama nambari ndogo za kijivu.

Penseli ya Haraka ni zana ambayo unaweza kutumia wakati wa michezo ya Sudoku ngumu au michezo ya Mtaalam wa sudoku. Ikumbukwe kwamba penseli ya haraka haipatikani kwenye ngazi ya Rahisi na ya Kati ya mchezo wa sudoku. Penseli ya haraka inaweza kuzingatiwa kama toleo la juu la Penseli. Tofauti kati ya Fast Penseli na Penseli ni kwamba Fast Penseli inaweza kukusaidia kujaza nambari zote zinazowezekana katika seli zote kwa sekunde moja, ambayo inaweza kuwa msaada mkubwa unapokuwa na matatizo ya kutatua baadhi ya mafumbo ya sudoku.
Penseli ya haraka ni nini, na kazi yake ni nini?

Ikiwa uko katikati ya mchezo, unaweza kurudi kwanza kwenye ukurasa wa mwanzo wa mchezo na kitufe cha kutoka kilicho kulia juu ya skrini ya mchezo. Kisha unaweza kubofya kitufe cha nyuma cha kifaa chako. Baada ya hapo, kutakuwa na skrini ya pop–up ikiuliza ikiwa utaacha mchezo. Ikiwa haukuweza kupata kitufe cha nyuma kwenye kifaa chako, unaweza kujaribu kuteleza juu chini chini ya skrini yako, kisha kitufe cha nyuma kinaweza kutazamwa.
Vinginevyo, unaweza kubofya kitufe chako cha nyuma kwenye kifaa chako moja kwa moja, itafanya kazi kama hatua zilizoelezwa hapo juu.
Hivi sasa, tunatoa kazi ya \"Ondoa Matangazo\" katika Mipangilio. Hatua halisi ni kama ifuatavyo.
Gonga kitufe cha gia kwenye kona ya juu kulia ya skrini yako;
Gonga Pata Malipo na SUBSCRIBE, halafu fuata maagizo hapo.

Kama jibu sahihi, kwa sasa, maswali yetu yote yamewekwa kama suluhisho la kipekee. Wakati mwingine inaonekana kuwa hakuna marudio baada ya kuingiza nambari, na inaonekana ni sawa kwa sasa, lakini ikiwa utaendelea kutatua fumbo, utaona kuwa huwezi kujaza nafasi zote. Hii itahukumiwa kama kosa wakati wa kuingiza nambari. Na ikiwa haujui ni hatua gani ya kuchukua baadaye, unaweza kutumia vidokezo:
Chagua seli ambayo nambari yake unataka kujua
Gonga kitufe cha Kidokezo katikati mwa upande wa kulia wa skrini;
Jibu sahihi litapewa kwenye seli iliyochaguliwa.
Nadhani baadhi ya mafumbo ya sudoku hayawezi kutatuliwa, na mfumo unatawala jibu langu kuwa sio sawa.
Unaweza kubofya kichupo cha \"Binafsi\" chini kulia ili uingie na akaunti yako kwanza. Kisha unaweza kupata kitufe cha bluu–kama–bluu kando ya jina lako, bofya, usawazishaji ungeanza.
Je! Ninaweza kulandanisha data yangu ya mchezo?
Hivi sasa, tunatoa mada tatu tofauti za usuli, ambazo ni mandhari angavu, manjano, na giza. Pia, kuna saizi tofauti za fonti hutolewa kwa chaguo lako. Unaweza kufuata hatua zifuatazo:
Gusa aikoni ya palette kwenye kona ya juu kulia ya skrini ya mchezo wako
Mada tatu za rangi na saizi tofauti za fonti zitawasilishwa na unaweza kuchagua moja unayoipenda.
Je! Ninabadilishaje mandhari ya nyuma? Je! Ninafanyaje fonti kuwa kubwa au ndogo?

"Katika Safu Mlalo F, nambari ya mtahiniwa 8 inaonekana tu kwenye Kiini F6 na Kiini F9. Katika Safu wima ya 5, nambari ya mtahiniwa 8 inaonekana tu kwenye Kiini D5 na Kiini H5. Tafuta safu mlalo na safu ambazo zimesalia na wagombea wawili pekee (mifuatano). Mgombea mmoja kutoka safu mlalo na mgombeaji mmoja kutoka safu wima lazima wawe kwenye block moja. Kitengo kinachoona visanduku vingine viwili kinaweza kuondolewa.2–String Kites hufanya kazi sawa na Skyscrapers: Moja ya ncha mbili za mifuatano lazima iwe kweli."

"Katika kizuizi 8, mgombea namba 2 huunda mnyororo wa 'T/L/+'. Mgombea namba 2 anaonekana tu kwenye seli za A6 na A2 katika safu ya A. "Nambari za watahiniwa wa Kiini C1 ni W, X,Y, Z(3, 2, 7, 1), namba za watahiniwa wa Kiini B2 ni W, Z (3, 1), namba za watahiniwa za Seli C4 ni X, Z (2, 1), nambari za watahiniwa za Seli C1 ni Y, Z (7, 1). C1 na B2 ziko kwenye block moja lakini katika safu mlalo tofauti, C4 na C7 ziko kwenye safu mlalo lakini ziko kwenye safu tofauti. Kwa hivyo tunaweza kufuta idadi ya watahiniwa Z(1) katika makutano ya kitalu ambapo Kiini C1 kipo na safu mlalo ambapo Celi C4, C7 iko. Mrengo wa WXYZ ni kama Mrengo wa XY na Mrengo wa XYZ, isipokuwa ni kundi la seli nne, moja ikishiriki kitengo na nyingine tatu. Seli ya kwanza katika WXYZ–Wing ina watahiniwa watatu au wanne huku wengine watatu, wanaoitwa mbawa, wakiwa na wawili kila mmoja. Kila moja ya mbawa lazima ishiriki mgombeaji mmoja na seli ya kwanza, (hiyo ni sehemu ya kugawana kitengo) lakini kila mrengo lazima ushiriki thamani tofauti. Ikiwa watahiniwa wa pili katika mbawa wote ni sawa, na pia ni sawa na mtahiniwa aliyesalia wa ngeli ya kwanza ikiwa ngeli ya kwanza ina watahiniwa wanne, basi iwapo ngeli yoyote ya tano itashiriki mtahiniwa huyo na kitengo na wengine wote, mgombea anaweza kuondolewa."

"Ukibadilishana safu mlalo na safu wima za masharti katika maelezo hapo juu, utapata Mrengo wa X kwenye safu wima. Chukua safu mbili (seti za msingi). Ukiweza kupata safu mbili, ili watahiniwa wote wa tarakimu mahususi (tarakimu ya samaki) katika safu zote mbili wamo kwenye safuwima (seti za jalada), watahiniwa wote wa samaki kwenye safuwima ambao si sehemu ya safu wanaweza kuondolewa. . Matokeo yake huitwa X–Wing katika safu. Ukibadilishana safu mlalo na safu wima za masharti katika maelezo hapo juu, utapata Mrengo wa X kwenye safu wima."

"Mtahiniwa 4 ana Mnyororo wenye nguvu–mbili–zaidi ya tarakimu nyingi:F1(4) ==(9)–A1(9)==(7)–C3(7)==3– 13(3)== 4 (Mahali pa kuanzia: Kijani. Pointi ya Mwisho: Njano. Mnyororo wenye kiungo chenye Nguvu: Mshale thabiti. Kiungo dhaifu: Mstari wa nukta. Ili tuweze kufuta nambari ya mtahiniwa 4 katika makutano ya F1 na 13. Msururu wa XY ni mnyororo. ambayo hutumia seli za bivalue pekee (sawa na Jozi za Mbali), lakini seli zinaweza kuwa na watahiniwa kiholela. Kizuizi pekee (mbali na mahitaji ya wazi ya viungo) ni kwamba, Msururu wa XY huanza na kuishia na kiungo thabiti kwenye tarakimu sawa. Kama ilivyo kwa X–Chains hii inathibitisha kwamba mojawapo ya ncha lazima iwekwe na mgombeaji, na inaweza kuondolewa kwenye seli zote zinazoona ncha zote mbili za mnyororo."

"Mtahiniwa X, Y (9, 7) na mtahiniwa Y, Z (7, 4) wako kwenye Kitalu cha 4. Wakati huo huo, hawako kwenye safu mlalo sawa. Mtahiniwa X, Y (9, 7) na mtahiniwa X, Z (9, 4) wako kwenye safu mlalo. Wakati huo huo, hawako kwenye kizuizi kimoja. Kwa hivyo tunaweza kufuta Z (4) kwenye makutano ya kizuizi ambapo X, Y. (9, 7) iko na mstari ambapo X, Z (9, 4) iko. Na tunaweza pia kufuta Z (4) katika makutano ya block ambapo X, Z (9, 4) iko na mstari ambapo Y, Z (7, 4) iko. Mrengo wa XY kwa kweli ni Mnyororo mfupi wa XY ambao unafafanuliwa kama mchoro na hivyo unaweza kupatikana kwa urahisi zaidi. Tunaanza kwa kutafuta seli ya bivalue (pivot). Vitengo vinavyowezekana katika kisanduku hicho huitwa X na Y. Sasa tunajaribu kutafuta visanduku vingine viwili vinavyoona egemeo (vipini). Mojawapo ya visanduku hivyo ina watahiniwa X na Z (Z ni kiteuliwa kiholela tofauti na X na Y) na watahiniwa wengine Y na Z. Sasa Z inaweza kuondolewa kwenye kisanduku chochote kinachoona vibano vyote viwili."

"Nambari za watahiniwa wa Kiini 13 ni X, Y,Z(5, 7, 9), nambari za watahiniwa wa Kiini H3 ni Y, Z (7, 9), namba za watahiniwa wa ngeli 19 ni X, Z ( 5, 9). H3 na 13 ziko kwenye block moja lakini kwa safu tofauti, 19 na 13 ziko kwenye safu moja lakini kwenye safu tofauti. Kwa hivyo tunaweza kufuta idadi ya watahiniwa Z(9) katika makutano ya kitalu ilipo Seli 13 na safu ambayo Seli 19 iko. Mrengo wa XYZ ni toleo lililoboreshwa la Mrengo wa XY: Sasa egemeo lina si tu vidahizo X na Y bali Z pia. Kwa hivyo Z inaweza tu kuondolewa kutoka kwa seli ambazo hazioni tu vibano, lakini egemeo pia."

"Seli A2 na B5 zina nambari ya mtahiniwa X,Y (1,5) pekee na haziko katika sekta moja. Wakati huo huo nambari ya mtahiniwa X(1) katika Safu Mlalo C inaonekana tu katika safu wima ya visanduku hivi viwili.Kwa hivyo tunaweza kufuta nambari ya mtahiniwa Y (5) katika makutano ya A2 na B5. Y–Wing huanza na mraba ambao una viambatanisho viwili haswa. Mraba huu wakati mwingine huitwa egemeo au bawaba.Unaweza kutumia Y–Wing ikiwa kila mojawapo ya watahiniwa wawili katika egemeo wataunda jozi ya kuunganisha katika vitengo viwili tofauti. Sehemu mbili za mwisho za jozi za kuunganisha wakati mwingine hujulikana kama pincers. Walakini, unaweza kutumia Y–Wing tu ikiwa vibano kila kimoja kina nambari mbili haswa, na ikiwa moja ya nambari hizo mbili ni sawa katika pincers zote mbili. Ni nambari hii iliyoshirikiwa ambayo unaweza kuiondoa.Tafuta miraba ambayo vibano vyote viwili vinaweza kuona. Ikiwa mojawapo ya miraba hii ina mgombeaji aliyeshirikiwa, unaweza kumwondoa mgombea huyo kutoka kwa miraba hiyo."

If a candidate number can only appear in two or three cells of each of three rows or three columns, and these cells are exactly in the same three columns or three rows, then the candidate number can be eliminated from other cells in these three columns or three rows.

First, in these three columns, only <c2>these marked cells</c2> can be filled with <c1>8</c1>. Each column must have a cell filled with <c1>8</c1>, so three of <c2>these cells</c2> must be filled with <c1>8</c1>.
These cells are also restricted in <c1>three rows</c1>, so three of <c2>these cells</c2> in <c1>these three rows</c1> must be filled with <c1>8</c1>. And a number can only appear once in a row.
So <c2>a marked cell</c2> must be filled with 8 in each of <c1>these three rows</c1>. Then we can delete 8 from other cells in <c1>these three rows</c1>.

If a candidate number can only appear in two cells of a row or column, and these two cells are in the same row or column, and if the same candidate number can also only appear in two cells of another row or column, forming a rectangle with the first two cells, then this is called an X–Wing structure. The candidate number can only appear in the diagonal cells of this rectangle, so the candidate number can be eliminated from other cells in the same row or column as the X–Wing.
Look, there are two rows having only <c2>two possible cells</c2> for <c1>1</c1> respectively. And they form a rectangle.
We can see that either the group of <c3>green 1</c3> or the group of <c4>red 1</c4> must be filled in.
So either <c2>b5</c2> or <c2>g5</c2> must be <c1>1</c1>, and either <c2>b9</c2> or <c2>g9</c2> must be <c1>1</c1>. Then we can delete <c1>1</c1> from other cells in these two columns.

When three pairs of candidate numbers, consisting of three numbers x, y, and z are formed in three cells, if the xy cell is in the same row, column, or block as the xz and yz cells, then either the xz or yz cell will contain the candidate number z. Therefore the candidate number z can be eliminated from other cells that are controlled by both the xz and yz cells.

Look, there are <c2>two cells</c2> containing <c1>2</c1> and <c3>3</c3>, and <c1>2</c1> and <c3>8</c3>, respectively. They are in the same row, column or box with <c2>the cell</c2> containing <c3>3</c3> and <c3>8</c3>.
If <c2>i9</c2> is <c3>3</c3>, <c2>g7</c2> must be <c1>2</c1>. lf <c2>i9</c2> is <c3>8</c3>, <c2>a9</c2> must be <c1>2</c1>. Therefore, either <c2>g7</c2> or <c2>a9</c2> must be <c1>2</c1>.
So <c1>2</c1> should be deleted from any of the <c1>intersecting cells</c1> of <c2>g7</c2> and <c2>a9</c2>.

Given three numbers x, y, and z, there are three cells that contain the candidate numbers xz, yz, and xyz. When the cell containing xyz is in the same row/column/block as cells containing xz and yz, one of the cells xz, yz, and xyz must contain the candidate number z. Therefore, any other cells controlled by xz, yz, and xyz can eliminate the candidate number z.

Look, there are <c2>two cells</c2> containing <c3>9</c3> and <c1>5</c1>, and <c3>3</c3> and <c1>5</c1> respectively. They are in the same row, column or box with <c2>the cell</c2> containing <c3>9</c3>, <c3>3</c3>, and <c1>5</c1>.

<c2>g8</c2> can only be filled with <c3>9</c3>, <c3>3</c3> or <c1>5</c1>. lf <c2>g8</c2> is <c3>9</c3>, <c2>i7</c2> must be <c1>5</c1>. lf <c2>g8</c2> is <c3>3</c3>, <c2>g6</c2> must be <c1>5</c1>. Therefore, at least one of <c2>these three cells</c2> must be filled with <c1>5</c1>.
So <c1>5</c1> should be deleted from any of the <c1>intersecting cells</c1> of <c2>g8</c2>, <c2>i7</c2> and <c2>g6</c2>.
